details.excerpt: Bea Schofield is Head of Data Intelligence at [Import.io](http://import.io/)
details.description:
Bea Schofield is Head of Data Intelligence at Import.io

Coming to Import.io with experience in international development and government research, Bea explores how import.io technology can be used to solve real-world data problems which had previously been exclusive to traditionally technical data users. With a master’s degree from Oxford University in contemporary African politics and experience working in the Houses of Parliament and for USAID, Bea’s understanding of national and international politics provide her with a firm foundation for exploring social issues with open data and demonstrating the power of import.io technology.


